```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
```

```{r}
Noaa_df =
  ny_noaa|>
  drop_na()|>
  filter(prcp > 0)|>
  separate(date, into = c('year','month'), sep = 4)|>
  mutate(
    month = str_replace(month,'\\-',''))|>
  filter(year == 2000)

```
